Unfold

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • Unfold.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the functionality and data for square objects that make the simulation area.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Square(int x, int y, int terrain, double food, double shelter, double temperature)
      Constructor for the class, sets coordinates for each instance and decides values based on its terrain type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square(int x,
              int y,
              int terrain,
              double food,
              double shelter,
              double temperature)
        Constructor for the class, sets coordinates for each instance and decides values based on its terrain type.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the square.
        y - y-coordinate of the square.
        terrain - type of terrain. Can be 0=plains, 1=mountains, 2=forest, 3= water.
        food - amount of food in the square.
        shelter - amount of shelter in the square.
        temperature - amount of temperature in the square.

    • Method Detail

      • updateSquare

        public Square[][] updateSquare(java.util.ArrayList<Creature> creatures,
                               Square[][] squares,
                               int rows,
                               int columns,
                               int x,
                               int y)
        Updates values changed during creature run time,
        Parameters:
        creatures - creatures ArrayList as it is before running the update.
        squares - squares array as it is before running the update.
        rows - amount of rows in the simulation area.
        columns - amount of columns in the simulation area.
        x - x-coordinate for the square.
        y - y-coordinate for the square.
        Returns:
        returns an updated Squares table.
